title: Coronavirus: Up to six months before life 'returns to normal' says government
description: It could be six months or more before the UK gets back to normal after coronavirus, says England's deputy chief medical officer.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
It could be up to six months before life in the UK returns to "normal", England's deputy chief medical officer has said.
Speaking at the government's daily coronavirus briefing, Dr Jenny Harries added: "This is not to say we woul… [+1095 chars]
